name: Tech Heaven
description:
[IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER: This gamejam project is very short, because of the overcomplicated ideas :( ]

TECH HEAVEN

Welcome to Tech Heaven - a heaven for tech! Ride around with a robot called D-Stroyer. Shoot everything that will stay in your path and more (?).

GOAL

Your goal is to collect an USB located at the end of each level...and that's basically it!

CONTROLS
  • A and D (or Left and Right arrow) - Move character
  • W (or Up arrow) - Jump
  • Mouse - Aim your gun
  • LMB (Left Mouse Button) - Shoot
  • RMB (Right Mouse Button) - Talk to an NPC (when being close to them)
  • Scroll Up / Down - Change gun power
CREDITS
  • Bitowsky (Twitter, YouTube) - Programming
  • VolcanoJungle (Twitter, Instagram) - Art / Level Design
  • Typicyl (Twitter, YouTube) - Music / Sound Effects
  • APerson (Twitter) - Additional Sound Effects

This project was created for Mini Jam 119 (even thought we submitted this game a few hours before the end of the whole event, we are still proud of this project because of the teamwork, that was put in that project <3)
